newsitem.title: USA: O'Donnell/Marshall return in Kmart holiday ads.
newsitem.headline: O'Donnell/Marshall return in Kmart holiday ads.

text.p: Kmart Corp. said Thursday that Rosie O'Donnell and Penny Marshall will once again be bargain hunting this holiday season in a broadcast campaign set to break the day after Thanksgiving.
The holiday commercials mark the one-year anniversary for O'Donnell and Marshall as Kmart Corp.'s spokeswomen.
The retailer said shooting on the commercials -- a total of 12 in four days -- begins this weekend in Brentwood, Long Island, N.Y.
